page.title: 07WEST WRATTING CLUBS
page.content: There is a thriving Over-Sixties Club meeting every 2nd Tuesday. Regular whist evenings are held. The West Wratting Wanderers are a group that perform Medieval Music and run productions sometimes in the church. Seasonal Clubs:- In the summer the Tennis and Bowls Clubs meet. Inter- village competitions are held. The Football Club meets in winter but is mainly drawn from outside the village. The Womens Institute which has 30 members has monthly meetings and mainly organises the social life of the village. The National Housewives Register is a group of women (mainly young mothers) meeting fortnightly in each others houses for discussions of interest and topical concern.
